about_the_game:
Dive into a dark and chaotic world where your sanity is your greatest ally — or your worst enemy.

In Dark Matters, you play as Edgar, a former detective scarred by tragedy, on a desperate quest to find his missing daughter, Alicia. His journey takes him to the shadowy city of Serra do Luar, a place where reality unravels and horrors lurk in the darkness. Drawn into a mystical portal, Edgar is thrust into a twisted dimension, inhabited by alien creatures and controlled by a sinister cult worshiping the mysterious God of the Void.

This stealth-action adventure with cosmic horror elements invites you to explore intricate environments, solve challenging puzzles, and evade monsters that rely on sound to detect you. Utilize Edgar’s detective instincts to highlight clues and interact with the world, but be cautious: each step may cost you your sanity, warping your very perception of reality.

With isometric/top-down gameplay and a unique art style blending cel shading and low poly, Dark Matter's delivers an immersive experience that combines narrative, strategy, and suspense.

Key Features

  • Immersive Exploration: Uncover secrets of the city and alien dimensions in dynamic, evolving environments.

  • Intelligent Stealth Mechanics: Evade monsters that track you by sound, and feel the tension of every choice you make.

  • Sanity as a Mechanic: Manage Edgar’s sanity to maintain control; lose it, and the horrors will consume you.

  • Unique Abilities: Master skills like slowing time, highlighting clues, and crossing dimensions as you progress.

  • Deep and Engaging Narrative: Gather crystal fragments, unravel mysteries, and fight to stop the God of the Void from consuming the universe.

  • Cosmic Horror Atmosphere: Oppressive environments, a haunting soundtrack, and shapeless alien creatures create a truly unique experience.

Prepare for a journey that will test your courage, strategy, and resolve. In Dark Matters, sanity is a luxury. Are you ready to face the void?

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon Rx 560 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Core i5-10600K / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT

short_description: An isometric stealth-action adventure blending cosmic horror and mystery. Explore a dark city, face sound-sensitive monsters, solve puzzles, collect crystals to unlock abilities, and manage sanity in a fight to stop the Void God.
